Title: Chapter 43
Writer: Michael Dobbs (based on the novels by), Andrew Davies (based on the mini-series by), Beau Willimon (created for television by), John Mankiewicz, Laura Eason (executive story editor), Bill Kennedy (executive story editor)
Actors: Kevin Spacey, Robin Wright, Michael Kelly, Derek Cecil
Plot: Claire threatens Frank while Frank makes a politically bold move that may provoke Russia.
